statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 100
SELECT product_name, last_reorder_date FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY last_reorder_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_threshold < 50
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > reorder_threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_reorder_date FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_threshold < 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory_levels WHERE last_reorder_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE last_reorder_date IS NOT NULL AND current_stock < 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 20 AND (reorder_threshold > 10 OR last_reorder_date IS NULL);
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, reorder_level FROM products WHERE reorder_level < 5;
SELECT product_id, alert_date, message FROM reorder_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE reorder_level < 20;
SELECT p.name, r.message FROM products p JOIN reorder_alerts r ON p.id = r.product_id;
SELECT p.name, SUM(r.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN reorder_alerts r ON p.id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, r.alert_date AS last_alert_date FROM products p JOIN reorder_alerts r ON p.id = r.product_id ORDER BY r.alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM reorder_alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > reorder_threshold;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, alert_message FROM products JOIN reorder_alerts ON products.product_id = reorder_alerts.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT alert_id, item_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM reorder_alerts WHERE alert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < reorder_level
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_id, product_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock < (SELECT AVG(current_stock) FROM product_inventory);

SELECT product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, reorder_quantity FROM product_inventory JOIN suppliers ON product_inventory.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN reorder_alerts ON product_inventory.product_id = reorder_alerts.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
